name: Out of the Woods Online Quiz | TV for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: What pest did scientist Baxter Stockman transform into after being doused with mutagen?
questions.explanation:
A Fly.

	Stockman was a scientist who mutated into a common housefly. He was wearing a mutagen collar while forced to work for others. His collar exploded at nearly the exact moment that a fly landed on his jacket. The character was voiced by Phil LaMarr.

questions.text: Ivan Steranko was mutated at the same time as another of Shredder's henchmen. After his mutation he was known as Rocksteady. What animal did he turn into?
questions.explanation:
Rhinoceros.

	Rocksteady was a Russian arms dealer prior to him mutation. After his mutation he was a 7 foot tall black rhino who was often paired with Bebop and Tiger Claw on missions. The character was voiced by Fred Tatasciore.

questions.text: A highly skilled thief by the name of Anton Zeck later became known as Bebop. What type of animal was Bebop?
questions.explanation:
Warthog.

	Zeck wore several high-tech gadgets to help him pull off his crimes before he was pushed into a vat of mutagen that was already laced with the DNA of a warthog. The character was voiced by J.B. Smoove.

questions.text: Mondo Gecko was a smooth talking, fast moving skateboard dude. What was his name before the mutation?
questions.explanation:
Jason.

	Prior to his mutation, Jason was a high school student who loved to skateboard. He mutated into a gecko after being hit by a canister of mutagen because he had his pet gecko on his shoulder when it happened.  The character was voiced by Robbie Rist.

questions.text: Slash was actually a onetime pet of the Ninja Turtles before he mutated and joined up with another mutant team. What type of creature was Slash?
questions.explanation:
Turtle.

	Slash, known as Spike before his transformation, mutated after he jumped into a puddle of spilled mutagen. The turtle had been flushed down the drain as a youngster and kept as a pet by Raphael before his mutation. After the mutation he joined the Mighty Mutanimals. The character was voiced by Corey Feldman.

questions.text: Dr. Tyler Rockwell was a chemist who transformed into what banana-loving animal?
questions.explanation:
Monkey.

	Dr. Tyler Rockwell was turned into Monkey Brains when Dr. Victor Falco doused him with mutagen. He is also a member of the Mighty Mutanimals. The character was initially voiced by Frank Welker and in later episodes by Tom Kenny.

questions.text: Which character, among the options given, is the only one that can fly?
questions.explanation:
Pigeon Pete.

	Not a lot is known about Pete from before the Kraang turned him into a mutant. He does have a strange fondness for sourdough bread. The character was voiced by A. J. Buckley.

questions.text: What is the name of the mutated character that Mikey kept as a pet in the lair?
questions.explanation:
Ice Cream Kitty.

	Ice Cream Kitty was just a simple stray house cat before April O'Neil found him in an alley and asked Mikey to keep him as a pet. While in the sewer lair, the cat ate some Neapolitan ice cream that was covered in mutagen and turned into a living, cat-shaped, pile of ice cream. He was voiced by "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" co-creator Kevin Eastman.

questions.text: One of the largest mutated animals on the series, what type of animal, a natural predator of the turtle, was Leatherhead?
questions.explanation:
Alligator.

	Leatherhead was the leader of the Mighty Mutanimals. He was mutated into a giant alligator by the Kraang.  Not much is known about the character before his mutation. The character was voiced by Peter Lurie.

questions.text: Karai, who started out the series as an evil character before her mutation, eventually became a sometime-friend to the Turtles. What did she mutate into?
questions.explanation:
Serpent.

	She was portrayed as a 16-year-old master ninja in early seasons, and later on she mutated into a serpent. Early in the series she was portrayed as the daughter of Shredder, the Turtles' biggest nemesis. Later on it was revealed that she was actually the daughter of Splinter, the Turtles sensei. Shredder had kidnapped her when she was a baby.  The character was voiced by Kelly Hu.
